sen.j: 板前（いたまえ）とは、日本料理店・料亭で料理をつくる人のこと。
sen.e: Itamae is a person who cooks meals at a Japanese restaurant or ryotei (traditional Japanese restaurant).
Itamae is a person who cooks meals at a Japanese restaurant or ryotei (traditional Japanese restaurant).
Itamae is a person who cooks meals at a Japanese restaurant or ryotei (traditional Japanese restaurant).

sen.j: - 板場を仕切る最上位者。
sen.e: Highest position in charge of the kitchen
Highest position in charge of the kitchen.
Highest position in charge of the kitchen.

sen.j: カウンターに立つ事が多い。
sen.e: Often stands at the kitchen counter
Often stands at the kitchen counter.
Often stands at the kitchen counter.

sen.cmt: 原文で｢｣の部分に' 'を付加しました。

sen.j: カウンターに立つ事が多い。
sen.e: Often stands at the kitchen counter
Often stands at the kitchen counter.
Often stands at the kitchen counter.

sen.j: 煮方からが本当に板前と言われる事もある。
sen.e: Some consider chefs with the position of nikata or higher one to be real itamae.
Some consider chefs with the position of nikata or higher to be real itamae.
Some consider chefs with the position of nikata or higher to be real itamae.

sen.j: - 焼き物（焼き魚）を作る人。
アユの塩焼きや、味噌田楽などを作る。
sen.e: Cooks dishes such as ayu (a sweetfish) broiled with salt and miso-dengaku (skewed and roasted tofu with sweet miso sauce)
Cooks dishes such as ayu (a sweetfish) broiled with salt and miso-dengaku (skewed and roasted tofu with sweet miso sauce).
Cooks dishes such as ayu (a sweetfish) broiled with salt and miso-dengaku (skewed and roasted tofu with sweet miso sauce).

sen.j: - 揚げ物（天ぷらの事）を作る人。
sen.e: Cooks agemono (deep-fried food, mainly tenpura, or, Japanese deep-fried dish)
Cooks agemono (deep-fried food, mainly tenpura, or, Japanese deep-fried dish).
Cooks agemono (deep-fried food, mainly tenpura, or, Japanese deep-fried dish).
Ranked the same as yakikata cooks
Ranked the same as yakikata cooks.
